text: Lidia Pitteri (9 September 1933 - 29 April 2017) was an Italian gymnast. She competed in seven events at the 1952 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Italian female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of Italy Category:Gymnasts at the 1952 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Venice
title: Lidia Pitteri
